meanings.definition: The system or arrangement of muscles in a body or body part.
meanings.sent1: The musculatures in the arm help us lift things.
meanings.sent2: She studied the musculatures of different animals for her research project.
meanings.sent3: The musculatures in the leg decided to take a break after a long run.
meanings.sent4: His strong musculatures were like steel cables under his skin.
meanings.sent5: The intricate musculatures of the face allow us to express various emotions.

meanings.definition: The development or condition of the muscles in a body or body part.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise can improve the musculatures of the body.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's musculatures were well-defined from years of training.
meanings.sent3: The musculatures of the back were feeling sore after the intense workout.
meanings.sent4: Her musculatures were like rubber bands, flexible and strong.
meanings.sent5: The musculatures of a dancer are finely tuned for agility and grace.
